current_step.name: Memperbaiki kesalahan pemanggilan metode di DashboardController
current_step.description: Memperbarui DashboardController.php agar memanggil MemberController::index() yang benar.

decisions_made: Decided to use existing MemberController and its dashmixDashboard method.
Decided to create views/member/dashboard.php for the dashboard view.
Decided to modify routes.php to point /dashboard to MemberController::dashmixDashboard().
Decided to refactor MemberController by removing the redundant index() method and renaming dashmixDashboard() to index().
Corrected routes.php to call MemberController::index() instead of MemberController::dashmixDashboard() after renaming the method.
Corrected DashboardController.php to call MemberController::index() instead of MemberController::dashmixDashboard() to resolve PHPStan error.
